name: ilab-unmul
description: Integrated Laboratory Management System - Universitas Mulawarman

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/dist client/dist
scripts.test:backend: cd server && npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.test:frontend: cd client && npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
